panels.description: Percentage of chunks that are filtered by using bloom filters
panels.title: Filter ratio - Bloom Gateway (server)

panels.description: Percentage of chunks that are filtered by using bloom filters
panels.title: Filter ratio

panels.description: Percentage of chunks that are filtered by using bloom filters
panels.title: Filter ratio - Index Gateway (client)

panels.description: Percentage of chunks that are filtered by using bloom filters
panels.title: Filter ratio

targets.expr:
(
    max by (pod, reason) (kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_reason{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"})
    * on (pod) group_left
    sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"}[$__rate_interval]))
) > 0

panels.description: Percentage of chunks that are filtered by using bloom filters
panels.title: Filter ratio - Index Gateway by route
Data skipped because they don't match any bocks

targets.expr:
sum(rate(loki_bloom_recorder_chunks_total{cluster="$cluster", job="$namespace/bloom-gateway", type=~"(found|skipped|missed)"}[$__rate_interval])) by (type)
/ on () group_left
sum(rate(loki_bloom_recorder_chunks_total{cluster="$cluster", job="$namespace/bloom-gateway", type="requested"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(rate(loki_bloom_recorder_chunks_total{cluster="$cluster", job="$namespace/bloom-gateway", type="filtered"}[$__rate_interval])) by (type)
/ on () group_left
sum(rate(loki_bloom_recorder_chunks_total{cluster="$cluster", job="$namespace/bloom-gateway", type="requested"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(rate(loki_bloom_recorder_chunks_total{cluster="$cluster", job="$namespace/bloom-gateway", type="filtered"}[$__rate_interval])) by (type)
/ on () group_left
sum(rate(loki_bloom_recorder_chunks_total{cluster="$cluster", job="$namespace/bloom-gateway", type="found"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(rate(loki_bloom_recorder_series_total{cluster="$cluster", job="$namespace/bloom-gateway", type=~"(found|skipped|missed)"}[$__rate_interval])) by (type)
/ on () group_left
sum(rate(loki_bloom_recorder_series_total{cluster="$cluster", job="$namespace/bloom-gateway", type="requested"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(rate(loki_bloom_recorder_series_total{cluster="$cluster", job="$namespace/bloom-gateway", type="filtered"}[$__rate_interval])) by (type)
/ on () group_left
sum(rate(loki_bloom_recorder_series_total{cluster="$cluster", job="$namespace/bloom-gateway", type="found"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(instance, pod) (rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total[$__rate_interval]))
+ ignoring(pod) group_right() 
(count by(instance, pod) (container_fs_reads_bytes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container="bloom-gateway", device!~".*sda.*"}) * 0)

sum by(instance, pod) (rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total[$__rate_interval]))
+ ignoring(pod) group_right() 
(count by(instance, pod) (container_fs_writes_bytes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container="bloom-gateway", device!~".*sda.*"}) * 0)

sum(sum by (instance) (rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total[$__rate_interval]))
+ on(instance) group_right() 
(count by (instance) (container_fs_reads_bytes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container="bloom-gateway", device!~".*sda.*"}) * 0))

sum(sum by(instance) (rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total[$__rate_interval]))
+ on(instance) group_right() 
(count by(instance) (container_fs_writes_bytes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container="bloom-gateway", device!~".*sda.*"}) * 0)) * -1

panels.description: For how long do pending tasks stay in the queue
panels.title: Queue Latency

panels.description: Inflight requests tracks all tasks both queued and in progress
panels.title: Inflight tasks
Processing time for tasks (per worker iteration)
We cache bloom blocks in memory to prevent the gateway from hitting the object store too often

targets.expr:
sum by (status) (
    rate(loki_bloom_blocks_cache_fetched_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"}[$__rate_interval])
)
/ ignoring(status) group_left
sum (
    rate(loki_bloom_blocks_cache_fetched_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-gateway"}[$__rate_interval])
)

sum(loki_embeddedcache_memory_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", cache="bloom-blocks-cache", container="bloom-gateway"})
/
sum(loki_embeddedcache_entries{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", cache="bloom-blocks-cache", container="bloom-gateway"})

panels.title: The gateway download bloom meta files and blocks from the object store.
